metadata.title: USN-7205-2 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-7205-1 fixed a vulnerability in Django. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 18.04 LTS.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that Django incorrectly handled certain IPv6  strings. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a  denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7205-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm9 python-django-common - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm9 python-django-doc - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm9 python3-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm9 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
